channel.title: Fixing item bonuses
channel.description: hey guys im using rune evo 728 and i have already added the item stats in my item bonuses folder, now i know i gotta delete the packed on but theres one thing, the only pack file for item bonuses is bonuses.ib and if i delete it my server wont run, is there anyway i can add itembonuses and apply them to the item? Any helps appreciated, thanks :)

item.title: Fixing item bonuses
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:
